extended_tooltips.text: Channels for <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinRevive_StartPersistent.effect_expire_delay"/> seconds on a dead hero's Darkthrone and then revives all heroes in the target area.

Channels for <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinRevive_StartPersistent.effect_expire_delay"/> seconds on a dead hero's Darkthrone and then revives all heroes regardless of their location. Enemies in target area will be struck for <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinRevive_ImpactDamageRadius.amount" style="Blue"/> damage.
